featured.text: Over the years, the fearless tribesmen have stood strong against slavery, and resisted the urging of the Kenyan and Tanzanian governments to adopt a more modern lifestyle.

definition.zh_def: 催促，強烈要求某人做某事。
definition.en_def: The act of strongly encouraging or persuading someone to do something.
definition.example: She was urging him to apply for the scholarship before the deadline.
